local_intent: Compute a pull-style grasp pose on the dishwasher handle after yaw alignment and verify the pose key exists.
assumptions: Handle is detectable in the current view
Yaw 90 aligns with the horizontal bar handle
0.01 alignment tolerance suffices for grasp planning
coherence_with_global: Implements the grasp-phase around ComputeGraspPose consistent with the global plan: detect, approach/align, set yaw, compute grasp pose, then verify pose availability before pick.
